Information

This was the Introduction to Computer Science class's final and it was also the first large group project that I ever worked on.
Now that I have completed many other projects, this one doesn't seem anywhere near as complicated or difficult, but it is still something that I look back at and take admiration in. This was my first stepping stone to prove that I am capable of programming.

The above image is a sample of the property cards that were made.

For the final we had to fully create a board game and our options were either Monopoly or Clue. We decided to take the assignment above and beyond the basic requirements of being able to play the game in the console and created a fully functioning ascii board with moving peices. (Seen Below)
